# Cleanse
```{r}
# all <- read_csv("C:\\Users\\user\\OneDrive\\Documents\\AQHI data\\cleansed_dataset\\all.csv")
all <- do.call("rbind", list(CentralWest, Eastern, KwaiChung, KwunTong, North, roadside_CausewayBay, roadside_Central, roadside_MongKok, ShamShuiPo, ShaTin, Southern, TaiPo, TapMun, TseungKwanO, TsuenWan, TuenMun, TungChung, YuenLong))
colnames(all)[which(names(all) == "日期")] <- "date"
colnames(all)[which(names(all) == "小時")] <- "hour"
colnames(all)[which(names(all) == "監測站")] <- "station"
temp_all <- all
temp_all[, c("NOX", "CO")] <- list(NULL) 
temp_all[, c('FSP', 'NO2', 'O3', 'RSP', 'SO2')] <- temp_all[, c('NO2', 'SO2', 'O3', 'RSP', 'FSP')]
colnames(temp_all)[-1:-3] <- c('NO2', 'SO2', 'O3', 'RSP', 'FSP')

CentralWest <- subset(temp_all, temp_all$station == "中西區")
Eastern <- subset(temp_all, temp_all$station == "東區")
KwaiChung <- subset(temp_all, temp_all$station == "葵涌")
KwunTong <- subset(temp_all, temp_all$station == "觀塘")
North <- subset(temp_all, temp_all$station == "北區")
roadside_CausewayBay <- subset(temp_all, temp_all$station == "銅鑼灣")
roadside_Central <- subset(temp_all, temp_all$station == "中環")
roadside_MongKok <- subset(temp_all, temp_all$station == "旺角")
ShamShuiPo <- subset(temp_all, temp_all$station == "深水埗")
ShaTin <- subset(temp_all, temp_all$station == "沙田")
Southern <- subset(temp_all, temp_all$station == "南區")
TaiPo <- subset(temp_all, temp_all$station == "大埔")
TapMun <- subset(temp_all, temp_all$station == "塔門")
TseungKwanO <- subset(temp_all, temp_all$station == "將軍澳")
TsuenWan <- subset(temp_all, temp_all$station == "荃灣")
TuenMun <- subset(temp_all, temp_all$station == "屯門")
TungChung <- subset(temp_all, temp_all$station == "東涌")
YuenLong <- subset(temp_all, temp_all$station == "元朗")

general <- subset(temp_all, temp_all$station != "銅鑼灣" & temp_all$station != "中環" & temp_all$station != "旺角")
roadside <- subset(temp_all, temp_all$station == "銅鑼灣" | temp_all$station == "中環" | temp_all$station == "旺角")

write_excel_csv(temp_all, "C:\\Users\\user\\OneDrive\\Documents\\AQHI data\\cleansed_dataset\\all.csv")
write_excel_csv(roadside, "C:\\Users\\user\\OneDrive\\Documents\\AQHI data\\cleansed_dataset\\roadside.csv")
write_excel_csv(general, "C:\\Users\\user\\OneDrive\\Documents\\AQHI data\\cleansed_dataset\\general.csv")
```
